files:

- wrapper: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/refs/heads/master/dxwnd/v2_06_09_build.rar
game:
  args: /R:1
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:

    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:

    file: gogsetup
    format: gog
- extract:

    file: wrapper
